name: Squabble Squabble
description:
Squabble Squabble is an interactive social game designed for virtual happy hours!

Use Zoom, Team, Skype, or any video communication platform with screen share to engage with a virtual audience. 

How to Play:

  • Begin by having the game host screen share the game page to a virtual audience through a video communication platform.
  • 2 players face off and are dealt 2 random cards; a character and a power up.
  • Each player gets a chance to state why their hand will win.
  • Audience discusses the arguments presented and casts their vote using the video chat.
  • Host tallies the votes and declare a winner or tie.
  • New Round begins with 2 new players!

Requirements: 

  •  Video communication platform with screen share feature
  • Minimum 3 vocal players (remote or in-person)
  • Maximum 14 vocal players (remote or in-person)
  • Max Audience size: as many as the video platform will allow for audience votes
  • Browser that runs HTML5

Created by Debbie Chan & Jeremy Moshe; a team from Game Hive

Made at TOJam 2022
